text: Sergey Valentinovich Pogorelov (; 2 June 1974 â€“ 24 April 2019) was a Russian team handball player. He won a gold medal in team handball with the national team at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney. He also won a bronze medal with Russia in team handball at the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens. He was born in Volgograd. Pogorelov died in Volgograd on 24 April 2019, at the age of 44. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sergey Pogorelov at Sports-Reference.com Category:1974 births Category:2019 deaths Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:2004 Summer Olympics Category:Handball players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Russia Category:Olympic gold medalists for Russia Category:Volgograd Category:People from Volgograd Oblast
title: Sergey Pogorelov
